Name: Alexander's Sister
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
7.5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: A green minty thing for dairy lovers.
History: The gin-based and crème de menthe-influenced Alexander's Sister appears in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book beneath the original gin-based Alexander Cocktail No. 1 and the brandy-based Alexander Cocktail No. 2 .
Nutrition: One serving of Alexander's Sister contains 203 calories
